# SpringBoneCollisionPlane3D

**Inherits:** [SpringBoneCollision3D](class_springbonecollision3d.md) **<** [Node3D](class_node3d.md) **<** [Node](class_node.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

An infinite plane collision that interacts with [SpringBoneSimulator3D](class_springbonesimulator3d.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

An infinite plane collision that interacts with [SpringBoneSimulator3D](class_springbonesimulator3d.md). It is an infinite size XZ plane, and the +Y direction is treated as normal.
